item.title: 长期更新-好论文解读收藏
item.description: 这篇笔记用于收藏别人的论文解读 Social Diffusion Title Unscramble Social Influence Locality for Modeling Retweeting Behavior 解读 代码 Role-Aware Conformity Influence Modeling and Analysis in Social Network 解读 DeepInf:Social Influence Prediction with Deep Learning 解读 Reverse Influence Sampling in Python 解读及代码 Cost-effective Outbreak Detection in Networks（CELF） 解读及代码 解读 DeepCas: an End-to-end item.content:encoded:
